about_the_game:
Fight you way with up to three friends, battling hordes of enemies, customizing your ship with devastating combos. Uncover secrets in this innovative class-based horizontal shooter multiplayer game.

Key Features:


  • Play with over 10 ships, each with 3 distinct skills, showcasing clear strengths and weaknesses.
  • Play as a tank, support or dps and build with your friends the perfect team.
  • Select 3 upgrades from a pool of 10 each playthrough, creating numerous powerful combinations.
  • Team up with friends locally for an exhilarating multiplayer experience.
  • Forge a unique path on a procedurally generated map teeming with hidden secrets.
  • Confront diverse challenges across meticulously crafted stages.

Class: TANK




Protect your friends either by taking direct hits for them or by strategically disrupting the enemy lines

Class: SUPPORT




Support your friends by either restoring their health or enhancing their combat skills

Class: DPS


Battle through obstacles with either sustained damage, area-of-effect attacks, or rapid bursts to clear your path effectively

name: Eternal Reverie Demo
short_description: Dive into 'Eternal Reverie,' a team-based roguelike shooter exploring the mysteries of an eternal war. Solo or in co-op, navigate diverse planets, pilot unique ships, and customize with 80+ upgrades. Unveil secrets on branching paths to increase your roster and discover the truths of the universe
